# simple headings

## heading with link <a href="https://adobe.com">Adobe</a>.

## heading with a link [Adobe](https://adobe.com).

Some text

## heading 2

### heading 3

#### heading 4

##### heading 5

# headings with extra styles

## heading with link <a href="https://adobe.com">Adobe</a>.

## heading with a link [Adobe](https://adobe.com).

## heading with bold format **Bold**

## heading with italic format _Italic_
